meanings.definition: Not competing with others for the same resources or benefits.
meanings.sent1: The nonrival team members worked together harmoniously.
meanings.sent2: The nonrival attitude in the group led to a successful project.
meanings.sent3: The nonrival cooperation among friends made the picnic enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Her nonrival nature shone brightly in the competitive environment.
meanings.sent5: The nonrival spirit of unity brought everyone closer.

meanings.definition: A good or service that can be consumed by multiple individuals without diminishing its availability for others.
meanings.sent1: The nonrival nature of the public park allows everyone to enjoy it freely.
meanings.sent2: The nonrival aspect of the online article meant anyone could read it without limits.
meanings.sent3: The nonrival cupcakes disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a nonrival treasure shared by all.
meanings.sent5: The nonrival resource of sunlight brightened everyone's day.
